list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: wash one's mouth and throat with a liquid kept in motion by exhaling through it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: instruct patients to gargle with warm water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hướng dẫn bệnh nhân súc miệng với nước ấm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act or instance or the sound of gargling.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a swig and gargle of mouthwash
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một swig và súc miệng nước súc miệng
